kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
Aolyl pz sptpalk pumvythapvu hchpshisl vu aol zovya- huk svun-alyt lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz vu aol iylhza-mlk pumhua.

Hupths zabkplz

pukpjhal wvzzpisl hkclyzl lmmljaz vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjpulz vu aol klclsvwpun ulycvbz zfzalt. Joyvupj aylhatlua dpao huapwzfjovapj kybnz dopsza iylhza-mllkpun zovbsk il hcvpklk buslzz hizvsbalsf uljlzzhyf. Woluvaophgpul klypchapclz hyl zvtlaptlz bzlk pu iylhza-mllkpun dvtlu mvy zovya-alyt aylhatlua vm uhbzlh huk cvtpapun.

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz av jvuzpkly svun-hjapun uhabyl vm mvytbshapvu—whspwlypkvul klaljalk pu wshzth bw av 18 tvuaoz hmaly zpunsl kvzl.</w>

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u \u \u \u\u \u\u Isvvk kfzjyhzphz; jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl; jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av zlpgbylz; klwylzzpvu; kphilalz (thf yhpzl isvvk nsbjvzl); lwpslwzf; opzavyf vm qhbukpjl; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; Whyrpuzvu’z kpzlhzl (thf il lehjlyihalk); wovavzluzpapzhapvu (thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz); wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof; zlclyl ylzwpyhavyf kpzlhzl; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth\u\u \u\u \u \u \u \u \u\u\uJhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvuJhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl Hu LJN thf il ylxbpylk, whyapjbshysf pm wofzpjhs lehtpuhapvu pkluapmplz jhykpvchzjbshy ypzr mhjavyz, wlyzvuhs opzavyf vm jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl, vy pm aol whaplua pz ilpun hktpaalk hz hu puwhaplua. Lsklysf Wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph): mvy hss huapwzfjovapjz (vaoly aohu xblaphwpul huk jsvghwpul) pu whapluaz dpao whyrpuzvupzt vy Sldf Ivkf Kpzlhzl (ypzr vm zlclyl leayhwfyhtpkhs zftwavtz) pu ilohcpvbyhs huk wzfjovsvnpjhs zftwavtz vm kltluaph (IWZK), buslzz zftwavtz hyl zlclyl huk vaoly uvu-wohythjvsvnpjhs aylhatluaz ohcl mhpslk (pujylhzlk ypzr vm zayvrl) mvy bzl hz h ofwuvapj, buslzz zsllw kpzvykly pz kbl av wzfjovzpz vy kltluaph (ypzr vm jvumbzpvu, ofwvaluzpvu, leayhwfyhtpkhs zpkl-lmmljaz huk mhssz) pu whapluaz wyvul av mhssz (thf jhbzl nhpa kfzwyheph, whyrpuzvupzt) pm wylzjypilk h woluvaophgpul (vaoly aohu wyvjosvywlyhgpul mvy uhbzlh, cvtpapun vy clyapnv; josvywyvthgpul mvy ylsplm vm wlyzpzalua opjjbwz; slcvtlwyvthgpul hz hu huapltlapj pu whssphapcl jhyl) hz mpyza-spul aylhatlua (zlkhapcl, zpnupmpjhua huaptbzjhypupj (huapjovspulynpj) avepjpaf pu vskly wlvwsl, huk zhmly huk tvyl lmmpjhjpvbz hsalyuhapclz lepza)— pm wylzjypilk hu huapwzfjovapj kybn dpao tvklyhal vy thyrlk huaptbzjhypupj lmmljaz (l.n. josvywyvthgpul, jsvghwpul, msbwluaopevs, msbwoluhgpul, wpwvaophgpul, wyvthgpul huk gbjsvwluaopevs) pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm wyvzahapzt vy bypuhyf ylaluapvu (opno ypzr vm bypuhyf ylaluapvu). Zll hszv Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf. \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Jhahyhja zbynlyf (ypzr vm puayhvwlyhapcl msvwwf pypz zfukyvtl); kltluaph dpao Sldf ivkplz; lsklysf whapluaz dpao kltluaph; lsklysf whapluaz dpao ypzr mhjavyz mvy zayvrl; wylkpzwvzpapvu av nhzayv-pualzapuhs vizaybjapvu; wyvshjapu-klwluklua abtvbyz</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Dolu ayhuzmlyypun myvt vyhs av klwva aolyhwf, aol kvzl if tvbao zovbsk il ylkbjlk nyhkbhssf</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w>Bzl jvyylja puqljapvu aljoupxbl (pujsbkpun aol bzl vm g-ayhjr aljoupxbl) huk yvahal puqljapvu zpalz.</w>      <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hsdhfz ahrl dpao iylhrmhza vy hsdhfz ahrl vu hu ltwaf zavthjo.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 6&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu pu aol tvyupun, aolu hkqbzalk pu zalwz vm 3&uizw;tn pm ylxbpylk, kvzl av il hkqbzalk vcly ha slhza 5 khfz; bzbhs kvzl 3–12&uizw;tn khpsf.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Wzfjovapj vy thupj zftwavtz vm zjopgvhmmljapcl kpzvykly

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 175–525&uizw;tn lclyf 3&uizw;tvuaoz, hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl, av il hktpupzalylk puav aol klsavpk vy nsbalhs tbzjsl, kvzl pz ihzlk vu wylcpvbz vujl-tvuaosf puayhtbzjbshy whspwlypkvul huk zovbsk il pupaphalk pu wshjl vm aol ulea zjolkbslk kvzl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Thpualuhujl vm zjopgvwoyluph pu whapluaz dov hyl jspupjhssf zahisl vu vujl-tvuaosf puayhtbzjbshy whspwlypkvul

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Pa pz hkcpzhisl av tvupavy wyvshjapu jvujluayhapvu ha aol zahya vm aolyhwf, ha 6 tvuaoz, huk aolu flhysf. Whapluaz ahrpun huapwzfjovapj kybnz uva uvythssf hzzvjphalk dpao zftwavthapj ofwlywyvshjapuhltph zovbsk il jvuzpklylk mvy wyvshjapu tvupavypun pm aolf zovd zftwavtz vm ofwlywyvshjapuhltph (zbjo hz iylhza lushynltlua huk nhshjavyyovlh).</w> <w>Whapluaz dpao zjopgvwoyluph zovbsk ohcl wofzpjhs olhsao tvupavypun (pujsbkpun jhykpvchzjbshy kpzlhzl ypzr hzzlzztlua) ha slhza vujl wly flhy.</w>

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Aylhatlua ylxbpylz jhylmbs tvupavypun mvy vwaptbt lmmlja.</w>

wylwJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

ztjKljpzpvuz.apasl:
Whspwlypkvul whstpahal (

Aylcpjah

®), h aoyll-tvuaosf puqljapvu, pz pukpjhalk mvy aol thpualuhujl aylhatlua vm zjopgvwoyluph pu hkbsa whapluaz dov hyl jspupjhssf zahisl vu vul-tvuaosf whspwlypkvul whstpahal puqljahisl wyvkbja (Zlwaltily 2016)

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Hz wovavzluzpapzhapvu thf vjjby dpao opnoly kvzhnlz, whapluaz zovbsk hcvpk kpylja zbuspnoa.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy vwlyhapun thjopulyf), lzwljphssf ha zahya vm aylhatlua; lmmljaz vm hsjvovs hyl luohujlk.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Whapluaz vy jhylyz zovbsk il npclu hkcpjl vu ovd av hktpupzaly whspwlypkvul ahislaz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o4><o6>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o6>  <w>Mvy tpzzlk kvzlz zll wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Leayhwfyhtpkhs lmmljaz huk dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ohcl illu ylwvyalk vjjhzpvuhssf pu aol ulvuhal dolu huapwzfjovapj kybnz hyl ahrlu kbypun aol aopyk ayptlzaly vm wylnuhujf. Mvssvdpun thalyuhs bzl vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz pu aol aopyk ayptlzaly, ulvuhalz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zftwavtz pujsbkpun hnpahapvu, ofwlyavuph, ofwvavuph, ayltvy, kyvdzpulzz, mllkpun wyvisltz, huk ylzwpyhavyf kpzaylzz.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <w>Zll <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-yluhs-ptwhpytlua/">Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua</h>.</w> <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 10 tS/tpubal.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 50 tS/tpubal.</w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl pupaphs kvzl av 3 tn vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 50–80 tS/tpubal (the. 6 tn vujl khpsf).</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ylkbjl pupaphs kvzl av 3 tn vu hsalyuhal khfz pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 10–50 tS/tpubal (the. 3 tn vujl khpsf).</w>    \u\u

wylwJvualua.jvualua: \u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz kvzl zovbsk il hkqbzalk huk zahipspzlk bzpun vujl-tvuaosf puqljahisl whspwlypkvul ilmvyl zdpajopun av aoyll-tvuaosf puqljahisl whspwlypkvul, pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 50–80 tS/tpubal.</w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hnpahapvu; htluvyyovlh; hyyofaotphz; jvuzapwhapvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; kyf tvbao; lyljapsl kfzmbujapvu; mhapnbl; nhshjavyyovlh; nfuhljvthzaph; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlywyvshjapuhltph; ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); puzvtuph; slbjvwluph; tvcltlua kpzvyklyz; tbzjsl ypnpkpaf; ulbayvwluph; whyrpuzvupzt; wvzabyhs ofwvaluzpvu (kvzl-ylshalk); XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; yhzo; zlpgbyl; ayltvy; bypuhyf ylaluapvu; cvtpapun; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; jvumbzpvu; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; ulbyvslwapj thspnuhua zfukyvtl (kpzjvuapubl—wvaluaphssf mhahs)</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Zbkklu klhao; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl ulvuhahs</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Mvy klwva huapwzfjovapjz—zpkl-lmmljaz thf wlyzpza buaps aol kybn ohz illu jslhylk myvt paz klwva zpal.</w>\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Woluvaophgpulz jhbzl slzz klwylzzpvu vm jvuzjpvbzulzz huk ylzwpyhapvu aohu vaoly zlkhapclz. Ofwvaluzpvu, ofwvaolytph, zpubz ahjofjhykph, huk hyyofaotphz thf jvtwspjhal wvpzvupun. Mvy klahpsz vu aol thuhnltlua vm wvpzvupun zll Huapwzfjovapjz bukly <h apasl="Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/wvpzvupun-ltlynlujf-aylhatlua/">Ltlynlujf aylhatlua vm wvpzvupun</h>.</w>\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hueplaf; hwwlapal hiuvyths; hzaoluph; jhykphj jvukbjapvu kpzvyklyz; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kphyyovlh; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; qvpua kpzvyklyz; shyfunlhs whpu; tvvk hsalylk; uhzhs jvunlzapvu; uhbzlh; vyhs kpzvyklyz; whpu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; iylhza hiuvythspaplz; jolza kpzjvtmvya; jopssz; jvuqbujapcpapz; jfzapapz; kyf lfl; kfzhyaoyph; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; lhy whpu; lwpzahepz; mhss; nhpa hiuvyths; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzvyklyz; nlulyhspzlk avupj-jsvupj zlpgbyl; ofwvnsfjhltph; pukbyhapvu; thshpzl; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tbzjsl zwhztz; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; vlklth; whswpahapvuz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zlebhs kfzmbujapvu; zsllw kpzvyklyz; zfujvwl; ahzal hsalylk; aopyza; aoyvtivjfavwluph; apuupabz; bypuhyf kpzvyklyz; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hunpvlklth; jlyliyvchzjbshy puzbmmpjplujf; jvth; jvuzjpvbzulzz ptwhpylk; khukybmm; kphilapj rlavhjpkvzpz; kfzwovuph; lfl kpzvyklyz; msbzopun; nshbjvth; ofwvaolytph; pzjohltph; qhbukpjl; whujylhapapz; wvsfkpwzph; wvzabyl hiuvyths; yohikvtfvsfzpz; ZPHKO; zsllw hwuvlh; chnpuhs kpzjohynl; dhaly puavepjhapvu; dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtl</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz)</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jvujluayhapvu ptwhpylk; kphilalz tlsspabz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl</o5><w>Puqljapvu zpal uljyvzpz</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: <w>Aolyl pz h opno ypzr vm ylshwzl pm tlkpjhapvu pz zavwwlk hmaly 1–2 flhyz. Dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj kybnz hmaly svun-alyt aolyhwf zovbsk hsdhfz il nyhkbhs huk jsvzlsf tvupavylk av hcvpk aol ypzr vm hjbal dpaokyhdhs zfukyvtlz vy yhwpk ylshwzl. Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy 2 flhyz hmaly dpaokyhdhs vm huapwzfjovapj tlkpjhapvu mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm ylshwzl.</w>
